name: Strandhill Lodge and Suites Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here for 3 nights mid July. This is one of the best places we have stayed in Sligo/Strandhill area. The room was spotless and spacious, well equipped and had a wonderful view of the sea and wonderful sunsets.The breakfast was continental and had a great range of cereals, juices and breads. The best part about this hotel is the friendly and helpful staff, David helped us every day to choose walks and scenic drives and was enthusiastic about local attractions, would highiy recommend staying at the Strandhill Lodge and Suites. Thanks again for wonderful stay. Martin and Helen Duffy.
reviews.title: Great accommodation in Strandhill

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I never write reviews for hotels but I felt I had to for this hotel as we really enjoyed our stay here. Great Hotel. The staff were very helpful and friendly offering guidance for places to eat nearby. The hotel was clean and modern. Breakfast was great also
reviews.title: great location

reviews.text: Stayed one night in spotless spacious suite, it felt as if we were the first guests to stay there. Wonderful views, delicious breakfast buffet. Great location! Wish we could have stayed longer! Pub and restaurant right next door, where we enjoyed a wonderful dinner and a few pints!
reviews.title: Outstanding!

reviews.text: Just back from 4 night stay at this hotel. I cannot fault it, if you are staying with children i would def recommend staying in a suite, large living area with seperate bedroom, extra space really handy. The view from the room was perfect, were able to watch the sunset, staff friendly and helpful and the breakfast is great, didnt miss a fry up at all. The restaurants are just on the doorstep and there is plenty of choice, we had a ball, travelled with 2 kids aged 1 and 6, lovely beach
reviews.title: Just Fabulous

reviews.text: Just back from 2 night stay in strandhill lodge and suites! I have stayed in hotels all over Ireland and can honestly say that this was the best ever!!! From check in to when we left, hubby and I couldn't fault one single thing! Room was spotless and excellent decor, we even had a small patio to sunbathe! Breakfast was great, didn't miss a cooked one at all! We usually stay on hotels with a pool but can honestly say didn't miss that eeither! Staff were so helpful and couldn't do enough for us!
reviews.title: Brilliant hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I almost never write reviews but in this case I found the space and the manager exceptional. The suite had an amazing view and was very spacious and had all that one would want and the breakfast was great. The manager went out of his way to be helpful and was very available for all situations. I would stay here again and would love to find this kind of hospitality in all the places we stay.
reviews.title: Wonderful

reviews.text: Had a wonderful stay. Easy to find. Lovely views of the ocean. Breakfast was great even though there were no hot options. There was choice between breakfast pastries, breads, yogurts, cereals, porridge, etc. Will definitely find another reason to visit Stradhill and this is where I'll be staying!
reviews.title: Excellent!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great location on the coast, close to a lovely small vacation/resort town. Large suite with all amenities one could want. In addition, the manager spent considerable time helping us with a travel problem - far beyond the call of duty. Great service!
reviews.title: Great Service!

reviews.text: Stayed in this hotel for 3 nights at the end of June, we had a lovely room on the first floor with a balcony overlooking the atlantic ocean, amazing view. Room was beautiful, with a fantastic bathroom, spotlessly clean, free bottled water is a nice touch, continental breakfast was ample, lots of choice and plenty of it. Staff are lovely nothing is to much trouble.
reviews.title: Amazing Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I went with my mum for her birthday, was a bit worried about meals for her, she's not a fussy eater just likes plain food, we had our meals in the restaurant next door to the hotel called the venue, they looked after her with no fuss or bother, staff couldnt do enough for us. Would recommend this hotel to anyone its a real gem, well worthy of its 4 stars.
reviews.title: Lovely view

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We really enjoyed our stay here. The rooms were lovely, and the staff were great and very willing to help. While staying here we managed to squeeze in horse riding, long walks on the beach over to the airport and we even treated ourselves to a seaweed bath! It was great to be beside all of these things! I'm looking forward to returning.
reviews.title: "A weekend to Remember"

reviews.text: The views from the bedroom were fantastic.The bed too, was big and extremely comfortable, making getting out of it very hard, Plus the the added touch of having an Ipod dock beside the bed... best idea ever! for playing music and charging our iphones. There were also great restaurants and pubs in the vicinity, so no need to drive! A complete stressless weekend if there ever was. Just have to go back again soon!
reviews.title: Great location, lovely rooms, idyllic views

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would highly recommend the Strandhill Lodge and Suites to anyone who is visiting the Strandhill area.
reviews.title: A comfortable hotel in a convenient location.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Peter & Ruth
reviews.title: Short stay - Very Good

reviews.text: This is a lovely hotel. Very spacious, comfortable rooms. The breakfast provided catered for all tastes and requirements. The staff were extremely courteous and helpful. The rooms were reasonably priced. I would not hesitate to recommend this hotel
reviews.title: Short Stay - Will Return Soon
Didn't want to leave
reviews.text: I decided to book an Irish three centre holiday for my husband's 65th birthday. He had traced his ancestors to Sligo so I got advice from a friend of my Daughter in Law who knew the area and our first stop was the Strandhill Lodge and Suites. Good large car park and when we checked in we couldn't have felt more welcome. The room was lovely, we had chosen one with a balcony which overlooked fields to the sea. The room had wi-fi, a useful safe and fridge and as well as the hospitality tray in room there was free tea and coffee machine and water dispenser available all day around reception area. Breakfast was continental with a good choice of meats,pastries,juice,cereals,fruit and fruit juices. There was no restaurant so we were given plenty advice on places to eat and we chose The Venue, an Irish pub next door which served excellent steaks and seafood. We enjoyed our stay so much at Strandhill Lodge and Suites and would return without hesitation.
The awful weather didn't stop us enjoying a night in Strandhill lodge. It was no problem for David to drive us all down to the Tra Ban restaurant which was very good because they also drove us home.
reviews.title: It's the staff that makes this Hotel

reviews.text: Breakfast wasn't the usual fry but was very good with plenty of fresh fruit, juices. Meats, cereals, dried fruit , bread, bagels ,scones and tea and coffee.
reviews.title: Pleasant Night

reviews.text: Beds were very comfortable. I had a kingsize bed all to myself and the bathroom was a good size with loads of towels.
reviews.title: Better with age
Suitable for all
reviews.text: Would certainly recommend and will hopefully return

description: Strandhill Lodge and Suites is a new hotel accommodation that has 18 Large Double and Single Deluxe Rooms and 4 Luxurious Superior Suites; with magnificent views of the famed Knocknarea and Strandhill Bay. All rooms are bright and spacious with a King Sized Bed and all modern conveniences. Rooms are suitable for two – three people sharing.
